statements: DELETE FROM road_closures WHERE closure_reason = 'Major Accident';
DELETE FROM maintenance_issues WHERE location = 'Main Street';

DELETE FROM road_closures WHERE closure_id = 100 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM detours WHERE destination_road = 'Main Street' AND detour_duration > '01:00:00';
